data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kamali, Kamran, Anderson, Steven C. (2015): A New Iranian Phrynocephalus (Reptilia: Squamata: Agamidae) from the hottest place on earth and a key to the genus Phrynocephalus in southwestern Asia and Arabia. Zootaxa 3904 (2): 249-260, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3904.2.4
